titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to phaseout the Mass Transit Account.
Highway Restoration Act of 2019
Highway Restoration Act of 2019
Highway Restoration Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Highway Restoration Act of 2019
This bill provides for a phaseout of the Mass Transit Account by the end of FY2023. Beginning in FY2024, no funds would be transferred to the account from the Highway Trust Fund.
